performances.title: Electric Dreams Live Set
performances.description: High-energy electronic set featuring tracks from their latest album 'Neon Pulse' plus exclusive remixes and collaborations.
performances.special_notes: Features special guest DJs and live visual artists

performances.title: Bass Drop Kings: Festival Destroyer
performances.description: The ultimate bass experience with massive drops, pyrotechnics, and crowd favorites. This is what festival memories are made of.
performances.special_notes: Pyrotechnics and special effects show - loudest set of the festival

performances.title: Sunset Stories Session
performances.description: Intimate acoustic performance as the sun sets, featuring storytelling between songs and audience sing-alongs.
performances.special_notes: Bring a blanket for the grass seating area

performances.title: Golden Hour Performance
performances.description: Full band performance showcasing songs from 'Golden Hour' album with stunning sunset backdrop lighting.
performances.special_notes: Perfect timing for golden hour photography

performances.title: Healing Soundscape Journey
performances.description: Ambient electronic meditation session perfect for recharging between high-energy performances.
performances.special_notes: Yoga mats and meditation cushions provided

performances.title: Late Night Laughs
performances.description: Stand-up comedy showcase featuring festival-themed jokes and audience interaction. Adults-only content.

performances.title: Funk & Soul Revival
performances.description: High-energy funk and hip-hop performance featuring live horns, interactive crowd participation, and dance battles.
performances.special_notes: Crowd dance competitions during set breaks

performances.title: Synthwave After Dark
performances.description: Retro-futuristic synthwave journey through the decades with neon visuals and vintage synthesizer magic.
performances.special_notes: Special neon lighting effects and retro visuals

performances.title: One Love Afternoon
performances.description: Feel-good reggae vibes to start your festival journey with positive energy and conscious lyrics.
performances.special_notes: Perfect for early arrivals and reggae fans

performances.title: Melodic Bass Experience
performances.description: Emotional future bass journey combining melodic elements with powerful drops and atmospheric buildups.
performances.special_notes: Perfect warm-up for Bass Drop Kings

performances.title: Jazz Fusion on Channel 2
performances.description: Progressive jazz fusion performance exclusively on silent disco Channel 2, featuring complex improvisation and virtuoso musicianship.
performances.special_notes: Available on Channel 2 of silent disco headphones

performances.title: Sunny Day Dreamscapes
performances.description: Upbeat indie pop perfect for afternoon vibes with catchy melodies and feel-good energy.
performances.special_notes: Great for dancing on the grass and sing-alongs

performances.title: Hometown Punk Takeover
performances.description: Raw punk rock energy from local favorites with political lyrics and DIY attitude. Support your local scene!
performances.special_notes: Local band showcase - support the scene

performances.title: Global Rhythms Opening
performances.description: Multicultural musical journey featuring traditional instruments and rhythms from around the world.

performances.title: Soul Searching Session
performances.description: Intimate acoustic soul performance perfect for winding down before the evening's high-energy acts.
